CustomField.formula:
IF(RecordType.DeveloperName='APT_Renewal_Quote', IF(AND(APT_Postbillpay_Included__c == 0 , ISPICKVAL(APT_Credit_Assessment_Status__c, "") ,(ISPICKVAL(APT_Method_of_Payment__c, "Charge Account")) || ISPICKVAL(APT_Method_of_Payment__c, "Charge Account + Sub Account")), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apt_CreditAssessment?proposalId="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APT_IntiateCreditCheck", "Account Assessment"),"_self"),
IF (AND(APT_Postbillpay_Included__c == 0, ISPICKVAL(APT_Credit_Assessment_Status__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(APT_Method_of_Payment__c, "Sub Account")), HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_SubAccountAssessment?proposalId="&Id&"&isExistingCustomer=true", IMAGE("/resource/APT_IntiateCreditCheck", "Account Assessment"),"_self"),NULL)),
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, "Accepted"), ISPICKVAL(APT_Credit_Assessment_Status__c, ""), (ISPICKVAL(APT_Method_of_Payment__c, "Charge Account") || ISPICKVAL(APT_Method_of_Payment__c, "Charge Account + Sub Account")), Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.Count_of_Contract_Start_Dates__c = 0 , Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.Count_of_Contract_End_Dates__c = 0 , Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.Count_of_Opportunity_Line_Items__c > 0 ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apt_CreditAssessment?proposalId="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APT_IntiateCreditCheck", "Account Assessment"),"_self"),
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, "Accepted"), ISPICKVAL(APT_Credit_Assessment_Status__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(APT_Method_of_Payment__c, "Sub Account")), HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_SubAccountAssessment?proposalId="&Id&"&isExistingCustomer=true", IMAGE("/resource/APT_IntiateCreditCheck", "Account Assessment"),"_self"),NULL)))
CustomField.label: Account Assessment
